Standard.Name: Calico's Rogues Snare a Merchant Ship 1.2.2

English.Text: It's a good fight in which the crew hold their nerve. At first range-finding proves difficult, alerting the pirates to ready their own guns. But after a few exchanges it is clear who is better-equipped, and the pirates raise the white flag. Although some of the men sustain injuries, the merchants are able to offer financial recompense.
